means: [计算机]检验( verify的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: The government has not verified any of those reports.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府还没有证实那些报告中的任何一个。

sentence.Network_en: The police verified that she had an airtight alibi.
sentence.Network_cn: 警方查明她有着无懈可击的不在犯罪现场的证据.

sentence.Network_en: Subsequent events verified that his judgement was at fault.
sentence.Network_cn: 接着发生的事件证实了他的判断有误.

PerfectNetExp.abs: verified 检定, verified 验证了, verified 经过验证的
My World: zi dian 4 ... 确凿 definite;conclusive;undeniable 属实 verified 长话短说 Make a long story short.
This theory was verified by the experiment of stratified sampling analysis of silicon carbide material., 应用碳化硅物料的分层取样实验对该理论进行了验证 , 提出了最佳取样方案.
Validity of the proposed modeling and control methods is verified by simulation ., 并通过仿真验证了模型和控制方法的正确性.

list.abs: 国外设计网站大全 - booboo design ... 密码 Password: 验证 Verify: 用户 Name.
字典中信字的解释 ... (4) 住宿两夜[ stay over for two consecutive nights] (5) 证实;应验[ verify] (6) 知晓[ know].

entry.def: If you verify something, you check that it is true by careful examination or investigation.

example.ex: I verified the source from  which I had that information...
example.tran: 我核实了我所获消息的来源。

example.ex: A clerk simply verifies that the payment and invoice amount match.
example.tran: 职员只是核实付款和发票上的数额是否一致。

entry.def: If you verify something, you state or confirm that it is true.

example.ex: The government has not verified any of those reports...
example.tran: 政府还没有证实那些报告中的任何一个。

example.ex: I can verify that it takes about thirty seconds.
example.tran: 我能证明，这大约要用30秒的时间。

means.word_mean: 1. supported or established by evidence or proof;

auth_sentence.content: This video cannot be verified by the BBC.
auth_sentence.res_content: This video cannot be verified by the BBC.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This video cannot be verified by the BBC.

auth_sentence.content: However, the claim could not be verified independently.
auth_sentence.res_content: However, the claim could not be verified independently.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However, the claim could not be verified independently.

auth_sentence.content: We have verified cases, but no precise number.
auth_sentence.res_content: We have verified cases, but no precise number.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We have verified cases, but no precise number.
